name: KC 36
description: Cultivated by KC Brains, KC 36 is an indica strain bred specifically to flourish at high latitudes. A cross between White Widow and KC 606, these frosty and compact buds deliver full-on body relaxation alongside a sweet and spicy floral aroma. The peaceful, introspective qualities of KC 36 make this indica a perfect pair for meditation and enjoying nature.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Relaxed, Uplifted, Euphoric, Hungry, Depression, Stress, Fatigue, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Paranoid
